name: Forgotten Books: The Enchanted Crown (Full)
description:
Unlock the complete adventure with a single purchase! No in-app purchases!

Your librarian friend wants your help as a journalist – he’s found an ancient book that is still unfinished. Can you save the world in the book before their story ends?

• SAVE A MAGICAL WORLD FROM THE TERRORS OF ELDOR
As you turn the pages of the ancient book, you are pulled into the world of Torelion. The dark mage Eldor has captured the king and threatens to take over the kingdom.

• EXPLORE FOUR NEW STORY WORLDS
Follow the white rabbit as you travel through 13 different locations to solve challenging puzzles and hidden object scenes. But stay on your toes, because the story rewrites itself as you go along!

• REWRITE THE ENDING AND SAVE THE KING!
Free the king from his chains and ensure a happy ending for the kingdom under siege!

• JUMP INTO THE ADVENTURE AND UNLOCK THIS COLLECTOR’S EDITION!
Complete your set of collectibles and earn achievements along your journey. Plus, enjoy even more puzzles and mini-games as well as wallpapers and concept art!

• Find thousands of hidden objects, plus solve tons of mini games and puzzles!
• Unlock this incredible Collector's Edition to gain access to all of the amazing bonuses and additional gameplay!
